verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know He rescued my soul
His blood has covered my sin
I believe. I believe
My shame, He's taken away
My pain is healed in His name
I believe. I believe
I'll raise a banner
'Cause my Lord has conquered the grave
My Redeemer lives,
My Redeemer lives,
My Redeemer lives,
My Redeemer lives,
You lift my burden
And I rise with you
I'm dancind on this mountain top
To see Your kingdom come
